"シャンプラン": "O-Oh... Really? I was just kinda joking around."
"Alright then, I need you to get me some Blizzardium."
"It's a pretty damn rare type of rock, and I gotta get some data on it."
"I hear you can find it in Western Kvaris. The location of 'em ain't too hard to figure out..."
"But Blizzardium can only be found when it's snowing. No blizzard, no Blizzardium. Get it?"
"Anyways, if you happen to find any, you know... It'd be really nice of you and stuff. You get the idea."
